widget.name: ShowHideFormButton
widget.description: A button that shows or hides the nearest div with a given class.

property.caption: Target CSS Class
property.description: The CSS class of the div that should contain the inline form. The widget will find the closet div to the button with this class.

property.caption: Shared Parent CSS Class
property.description: The CSS class of the nearest parent node that both the target div and button share.

property.caption: Toggle CSS Class
property.description: A class to add/remove from the button when it's clicked
